headline: Semtech (SMTC) Surpasses Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Semtech (SMTC) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +2.50% and +0.61%, respectively, for the quarter ended July 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Micron Stock Investors Are Worried About a Potential Trump Admin Investment. How Should You Play MU Here?
summary: Following reports of an alleged 10% stake in Intel, the government is now mulling a stake in the memory chipmaker.

headline: Trump Says He Wants More Stakes in Companies After Intel Deal
summary: Following the government’s agreement to convert nearly $9 billion in grants into a 10% stake in Intel, President Trump says the deal is a new way of doing industrial policy and signals more agreements could be ahead.

raw.headline: Trump Says He Wants More Stakes in Companies After Intel Deal

headline: HBM Drives Micron's Growth: Can MU Sustain the Momentum?

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Micron Technology (MU) Upgrading Its Q4 Revenue and Earnings Forecasts
summary: Earlier this month, Micron Technology raised its fourth quarter fiscal 2025 guidance, projecting revenue of US$11.2 billion ± US$100 million and diluted earnings per share of US$2.64 ± US$0.07, both higher than its previous forecast. This update marks a meaningful upward revision in both revenue and earnings expectations, signaling increased confidence in business conditions for the current quarter. We'll explore how Micron's upgraded outlook for quarterly revenue and earnings adds a fresh...
